column2: This character follows the theology of John Calvin of Geneva.
This character is a follower of the Swiss Reformator Huldrych Zwingli.
This character stands in the tradition of the fervor of small antediluvian churches.
This character is a member of the Kirk, standing in the Presbyterian tradition of John Knox.
While such a decision might outrage the whole realm and my fellow believers, I have decided it is time for me to change paths in the the Reformed school of thought I have followed for now.
I choose the school of Calvin.
I shall follow Zwingli's thought, for scripture is the inspired's word of God!
I favor Fischli's thought and the tradition of small antediluvian churches.
I shall follow John Knox's theology!
